<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">
[Font of Serenity](/Spells.aspx?ID=2406)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 268

**Domain**
[Repose](/Domains.aspx?ID=116)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Area** 15-foot [burst](/Rules.aspx?ID=2385)

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

A divine beacon radiates serenity, soothing nearby allies. Allies within the area gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=590) effects. An ally can touch the font at the center of the burst as an [Interact](/Actions.aspx?ID=2297) action; if they do so, the spell attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=3280) one emotion effect affecting the ally of the ally’s choice, after which that emotion effect is temporarily immune for 1 day. If the spell succeeds at the counteract check, it removes the emotion effect from your ally, though not from any other creatures the effect might be affecting.

---
**Heightened (+4)** The bonus increases by 1.
name: Font of Serenity
